subject: Re: For Those Serious About Research
author: eastern_paranormal
full_text:
Julie,


They were very clear.
I am envious of your editing skills :).

Gab

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Jules" <ghostchasingfool@...> wrote:
>
> Guys, 
>        I just posted several files from a joint session this 
weekend in 
> Kentucky.  I would appreciate the imput from those who are serious 
> about the research here.  Many of the serious researchers have 
spent 
> years, and countless hours a day testing these lines of 
communication.  
> I for one refuse to allow the negitive get to me and will continue 
to 
> work either independently or with my fellow colleages who truly 
respect 
> each other and their contributions in this area.
> 
>         So with that being said, I hope you enjoy the audio clips.  
> They are from a Joe's Box session.
> 
>         In addition, I have introduced several new researchers to 
the 
> RS hacked in hopes that their their future studies will add in our 
up 
> hill climb in pursuing what we started.
> 
> Thanks!
> Juli
>
